pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NLIGraphSpacyKnowledge graph using NLP Spacy## Installation```pythonpip install nligraphspacy```## Implementation```pythonfrom nligraphspacy import NLIGRAPHnligraph = NLIGRAPH.RelationEntityExtract("She worked in the city of London")nligraph.process_text()# ('She', 'worked', 'London')```
